name: Craft and Punishment - Normal Guy Edition
name_original: Craft and Punishment - Normal Guy Edition
description:
A normal guy awakens on a normal day. What isn't so normal, however, is the appearance of 3 incredibly strong bosses and their impending doom on your turf. There also seems to be a floating pyramid up in the sky as well...

The stores are closed. Everyone's in a panic. A normal guy seems to be the right person for the job. Whatever you find on your journey, you must make use of it!

**PLAY IN FULLSCREEN** (button at the bottom right)

BOSS RUSH JAM 2023 - MAKESHIFT. 

You start off with a cheap, plastic katana and kunai you bought previously at a local anime store; along with a random piece of cardboard you found for a shield. As you fight your way through these bosses, you gather items dropped by them to craft and make something new with what you have.

CONTROLS

 Gamepad (Recommended)

OR Keyboard OR Keyboard + Mouse
WASD - Move

I - Projectile

O - Shield

K - Dash

L - Attack

CREDITS

Director, Programming, Music + SFX, Map design, Animations, Game Design - Draelent

Concept art, Character + Item design, Cutscenes, Graphics - plunch

Every art, sound and code were made during the jam, for the jam, except level design assets which are from Szadiart.

(Also if you somehow get offended by a joke in that game, I want to let you know that my wife actually wrote it...)
